GSL Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 32 Management Trainee Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 25, 2025, 10:42 IST
 Goa Shipyard Limited
 32 Jobs |  Posted On : 25-Aug-2025 |  Goa |  Salary : 40,000 to 140,000




FOLLOW

The Goa Shipyard Limited (Goa Shipyard) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 32 Management Trainee Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech in Electrical, Electronics, Mechanical Engineering, CA, Any Degree can apply for the GSL Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Goa.

GSL Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Management Trainee	32	CA, B.E./B. Tech in Electrical, Electronics, and Mechanical Engineering, Any Degree

GSL Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 28 Years.

Age Relaxation:

For OBC candidates: 03 Years.
For SC/ST candidates: 05 Years.

GSL Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the

Computer-Based Test (CBT)/ Pen Paper-Based Test.

GSL Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

The application fee

For all other candidates: Rs. 500/-.
For SC/ST/PWD candidates: NIL.

GSL Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 40,000/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 1,40,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the GSL Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the GSL Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligiblity Criteria.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form before the last date.
Download & take a filled application form for further use.

Important Dates:

Starting date	25-08-2025
Closing date	24-09-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Apply Online	Click Here
